markdownRemark.html:
1. Place the paginate tags around a forloop, that loops through products within a collection.
  2. Replace limit with the number of products you wish to show per page on the collection.
{% paginate collection.products by limit %}
  <-- Product 'forloop' content goes here -->
{% endpaginate %}

frontmatter.title: Product limit
frontmatter.desc: A product limit sets a limit on the number of products rendered on a single page. This example demonstrates how to limit the number of products that show per collection page. Learn more about product limits in the [Shopify Help Center](https://help.shopify.com/en/themes/customization/collections/show-more-products-on-collection-pages).
